attributes.action: relatives who have not  helped  or  looked after the deceased  should  not be able to claim a share of his/her estate
attributes.additional_details: if  a deceased relative does not leave a will the law should be changed so that if only one of the deceased relatives  has looked after  him/her  and the others have done nothing   at all these other beneficeries  should not be alllowed to claim  any part  of the estate  if the  one who has can prove  that  he/she has done everything  to look after the said person  then they should get everything
